meta.dc:title: SJ 67 ENR: Providing for the reappointment of Risa Lavizzo-Mourey as a citizen regent of the Board of Regents of the Smithsonian Institution.

meta.property: One Hundred Sixteenth Congress of the United States of America
IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES
Providing for the reappointment of Risa Lavizzo-Mourey as a citizen regent of the Board of Regents of the Smithsonian Institution.

main.name: SJRES67
main.longTitle: JOINT RESOLUTION Providing for the reappointment of Risa Lavizzo-Mourey as a citizen regent of the Board of Regents of the Smithsonian Institution.
main.enactingFormula: Resolved by the Senate and House of Representatives of the United States of America in Congress assembled,

section.content: That, in accordance with section 5581 of the Revised Statutes (20 U.S.C. 43), the vacancy on the Board of Regents of the Smithsonian Institution, in the class other than Members of Congress, occurring by reason of the expiration of the term of Risa Lavizzo-Mourey of Pennsylvania on February 21, 2020, is filled by the reappointment of the incumbent. The reappointment is for a term of six years, beginning on the later of February 21, 2020, or the date of enactment of this joint resolution.

signature.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate
